item.title: Folk playlist for 12/2011
item.description: Including: Acoustic Session: Happy, Chris Volpe, Fleet Foxes, Gregory Alan Isakov, Johnny Flynn, Justin Townes Earle, Laura Marling, Lucy Rose, The Fireplace: Aa Bondy, The Tallest Man On Earth.

item.description: Including: "Killing Time", Bob Dylan, Boy & Bear, Gregory Alan Isakov, Longest Dream, Mountain Man, Neil Young, Okkervil River, Sam Amidon, The High Kings.

item.description: Including: Ben Howard, Doc Watson, Fionn Regan, Fleet Foxes, Joe Pug, Leo Kottke, Sufjan Stevens, Tallest Man On Earth, The Mountain Goats, The Tallest Man On Earth.

item.description: Including: All My Days, Bon Iver, Boy & Bear, Fleet Foxes, Iron & Wine, James Blackshaw, The Cave Singers, The Low Anthem, The Tallest Man On Earth, William Elliott Whitmore.
